text: Aspergillus nishimurae is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Fumigati section. The species was first described in 2001.Takada, M.; Horie, Y.; Abliz, P. 2001. Two new heterothallic Neosartorya from African soil. Mycoscience. 42(4):361-367 ==Growth and morphology== A. nishimurae has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below. Aspergillus_nishimurae_cya.png|Aspergillus nishimurae growing on CYA plate Aspergillus_nishimurae_meaox.png|Aspergillus nishimurae growing on MEAOX plate == References == nishimurae Category:Fungi described in 2001
title: Aspergillus nishimurae
